content: Beacon chain attracts a lot of institutional investors to the ecosystem

author: alexssd7fp
content: And mining attracts mostly the rest investors

author: alexssd7fp
content: I think that the coexistence of Beacon chain and PoW during the same time period was the key in Ethereum's success

author: alexssd7fp
content:
Institutional investors (stakers) provided locked liquidity, which reduced the speculative pressure from the market as they now have a place to make their ETHs make more.

Miners, on the other hand, attracted a lot of regular users and community members to the ecosystem and contributed to the wide adoption of Ethereum.
